resources.string: You can use this page to deactivate your account if it is currently active, or to reactivate your account if you previously deactivated it. in order to reactivate your account, you will need to verify your email address and reset your password.
We\'ve updated our Terms of Use, Data Policy and Cookies Policy reflecting on our Fruits for Thought. We are continuing to offer the utmost service to our lovely users.
Orange is a round coloured citrus fruits that has a thick skin pilled before consumption.

60 Calories, No fat or sodium, 3 grams of fibre, 12 grams of sugar, 1 gram of protein, 14 micro grams of vitamin A, 70 milligrams of vitamin C, 237 milligrams of potassium and 15.4 grams of carbohydrate.

99 Calories, 2.6 grams of fibre, 22.5 grams of sugar, 0.6 grams, fat 1.4 gram of protein, adequate milligrams of vitamin A,B6, E, K, 70 milligrams of vitamin C, 237 milligrams of potassium and 24.7 grams of carbohydrate.
Watermelon is a large round flowering fruit with green rind and bright red flesh.

30 Calories, 0.2g fat, 1 milligram of sodium, 0.4 grams of fibre, 6 grams of sugar, 0.6 gram of protein, 2 milligrams of vitamin B6, 13 milligrams of vitamin C, 112 milligrams of potassium and 8 grams of carbohydrate.
Mango is an edible stone fruit produced by the tropical tree Mangifera indica.
Pawpaw is a fruit with green skin, sweet yellow flesh and black seeds.

80 Calories, 1.2 gram fat, 1 milligram of sodium, 2.6 grams of fibre, 6 grams of sugar, 1.2 grams of protein, milligrams of vitamin B6, 18.3 milligrams of vitamin C, 345 milligrams of potassium and 18.8 grams of carbohydrate.
Cucumber is a widely cultivated creeping vine plant used as culinary vegetable.
Pineapple is a large tropical fruit with a spiky tough skin and sweet inside.

50 Calories, 0.1 gram fat, 1 milligram of sodium, 1.4 grams of fibre, 10 grams of sugar, 0.5 grams of protein, 12 milligrams of vitamin B6, 58.3 milligrams of vitamin C, 145 milligrams of magnesium and 18.8 grams of carbohydrate.
Guava is a tropical fruit that is grown in dry or humid heat. Both its fruit and leaves are edible.

68 Calories, 0.3g fat, 2 milligram of sodium, 5 grams of fibre, 9 grams of sugar, 2.6 gram of protein, 5 milligrams of vitamin B6, 380 milligrams of vitamin C, 417 milligrams of potassium and 14 grams of carbohydrate.
Banana is an elongated edible fruit, produced by several kinds of large herbaceous.

89 Calories, 0.3g fat, 1 milligram of sodium, 2.6 gram of fibre, 12 grams of sugar, 1.1 gram of protein, 20 milligrams of vitamin B6, 14 milligrams of vitamin C, 358 milligrams of potassium and 23 grams of carbohydrate.

52 Calories, 0.2g fat, 1 milligram of sodium, 2.4 grams of fibre, 10 grams of sugar, 0.3 gram of protein, 5 milligrams of vitamin B6, 70 milligrams of vitamin C, 107 milligrams of potassium and 14 grams of carbohydrate.

Reliance Farm Industry welcome you to buy our Apple fresh fruits. It is a sweet edible fruit produced by an apple tree, it is widely cultivated in the farm. We are specialised in growing healthy fruits for consumers nutrition. We wish you a happy life!
